name: Felongeist
description:
Felone, the serial jaywalker, was terribly injured in a recent street-crossing escapade.

As the half-dead convict’s ghost, possess hospital staff and transport Felone’s body out of the hospital to evade the consequences of the law.

Make strategic decisions based on the changing hospital environment and surrounding objects at your disposal to escape with the Felongang.

This game was created in 2017 by six college students. It was later accepted into the Student Games category of the 2017 Boston Festival of Indie Games.

Let us know what you think of it in the comments!
